Shaken, Not Purred: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.
A\u2014Another Round?: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Double Shot, On The Rocks: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Cat's Tail Closing Time: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts: • Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%. • Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
